channel.title: Why wont 508 clients work for me :S
channel.description:
ok so atm im running a 317 server but i would lik to try running it as a 508, for example i download "mithscape" client and server and wen i try to load client and put myservers ip in the ip changer box ... it just stops loading and dont do nothing :S
any help please?? MSN - morgan_92@hotmail.com

item.title: Why wont 508 clients work for me :S
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

You need to have the server you’re trying to connect to online before you load the client.

Read full topic
item.source: Why wont 508 clients work for me :S
